Name: Lizardquest-Alien waters
About the game: Hello, i am the developer of this game Lizardquest-Alien waters, and as we all like The Role Playing games and Adventures, this game is an Adventure game , I try to make an interesting and fun game, simple to play in the beautiful world. You start as a low leveled creature , in an Science research base, after you got captured, the scientists are trying to find the way to use your skills and abilities, but good you got free and now trying to survive! The are many skills and stats in game, and you are free to do as you wish, some skills are passive and some are active, but you have to figure it as you play, by playing and trying things. There are many quests in the game, but they are side quests , to gain skills or items, and the feature in the game is that all you do, changes your world, you do something bad, you get 'Bloody' Points, sure you can gain with it more Might and power, but your skills and the Npc's will react different depends on your doings, as if you help you may gain more 'Mercy' or 'Humanity' Points. This is an Adventure Role playing Game, thanks for playing, and have fun!
